name: The Seesaw Redemption (MsBasilisk)
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021. Help two dwarves as they must work together to escape a mine filling with lava. They must jump on the seesaw elevator one after another to reach the escape rope at the top.

Controls:

Dwarf 1: WASD to move, Left Ctrl to jump

Dwarf 2: Arrow keys to move, Space to jump

Credits:

Micky Linhan Wang - Game Designer

Hana Vargas- Programmer

Gabriel Soler - Programmer

Rafael De José - Character Artist

Brennan Jeppson - Environment Artist

Sine Basilisk - Composer and Sound Designer
